sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Home Depot (HD) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.7%.
Year to date, Home Depot registers a 33.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Exxon Mobil Corp (XOM), trading down 0.7%.
Exxon Mobil Corp is showing a gain of 5.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group (GS), trading down 0.4%, and Cisco Systems (CSCO), trading up 1.5% on the day.
